title: How Much Do You Know About New York City History?

questions.question: In the Revolutionary War, which was a battle George Washington won in New York City?
Under the Articles of Confederation, what distinction did New York City carry?
options: It was the only place where imports were allowed to come into the nation
It was where all the delegates needed to live
The nation was named New York Nation after it

questions.question: The nation was named New York Nation after it
options: Murray Hill, Tribeca, Chelsea, Midtown East, Kew Gardens
Staten Island, Manhattan, Queens, Bronx, Brooklyn
Staten Island, Long Island, Queens, Manhattan, Brooklyn
Houston, Mott, West 4th, Avenue A, River

questions.question: Who did Henry Hudson work for?
What was the name of the Dutch settlement at the southern tip of Manhattan Island that defended the fur trade operations for the Dutch West India Company?
